Translations.Text: Phir tu nay dekha us shaks ko jo hamari aayat ko manney se inkar karta hai aur kehta hai ke main to maal aur aulad se nawaza hi jata rahunga
Kya usey gaib ka pata chal gaya hai ya usne rehman se koi ahad le rakkha hai
Hargiz nahin, jo kuch yeh bakhta (boasts of) hai isey hum likh lengey aur iske liye saza mein aur zyada izafa karenge
Jis sar-o-samaan aur laao lashkar ka yeh zikr kar raha hai woh sab hamare paas reh jayega aur yeh akela hamare saamne hazir hoga
In logon ne Allah ko chodh kar apne kuch khuda bana rakkhey hain taa-ke woh inke pushtebaan (supporters) hon
Koi pushtebaan na hoga, woh sab inki ibadat ka inkar karenge aur ultey inke mukhalif ban jayenge
Kya tum dekhte nahin ho ke humne in munkireen e haqq par shayateen chodh rakkhey hain jo inhein khoob khoob (mukhalifat e haqq par) uksa rahey hain
Accha, to ab inpar nuzul e azaab ke liye betaab na ho, hum inke din gin rahey hain
Woh din aane wala hai jab muttaqi logon ko hum mehmaano ki tarah rehman ke huzur pesh karenge
Aur mujreemon ko pyase jaanwaron ki tarah jahannum ki taraf haank le jayenge
Us waqt log koi sifarish laney par qaadir na honge bajuz uske jisne Rehman ke huzur se parwana hasil karliya ho
Woh kehte hain ke rehman ne kisi ko beta bana liya hai
Sakht behuda baat hai jo tum log ghadh laye ho
Qareeb hai ke aasmaan phatt padein, zameen shaqq ho jaye (split asunder) aur pahad gir jayein
Is baat par ke logon ne Rehman ke liye aulad honay ka dawa kiya
Rehman ki yeh shaan nahin hai ke woh kisi ko beta banaye
Zameen aur aasmaano ke andar jo bhi hain sab uske huzoor bandon ki haisiyat se pesh honay waley hain
Sab par woh muheet (encircled) hai aur usne unko shumaar kar rakkha hai
Sab qayamat ke roz fardan fardan (akele akele) uske saamne hazir hongey
